                                                                                    |
| FUNCTION    | public         | approve_inventory_request                        | p_request_id bigint, p_note text DEFAULT NULL::text, p_receive_quantity integer DEFAULT NULL::integer                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | void                                                                                                                                                                     | null                                                                                                                           | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.approve_inventory_request(p_request_id bigint, p_note text DEFAULT NULL::text, p_receive_quantity integer DEFAULT NULL::integer)
 RETURNS void
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
DECLARE
    v_actor bigint := NULLIF(current_setting('app.user_id', true),'')::bigint;
    v_req RECORD;
BEGIN
    SELECT * INTO v_req FROM inventory_requests WHERE request_id = p_request_id FOR UPDATE;
    IF NOT FOUND THEN RAISE EXCEPTION 'Inventory request % not found', p_request_id; END IF;
    IF v_req.status <> 'pending' THEN RAISE EXCEPTION 'Request % is not pending (current: %)', p_request_id, v_req.status; END IF;

    UPDATE inventory_requests
       SET status='approved', decision_at=now(), decision_by=v_actor, decision_remarks=p_note, updated_at=now(), updated_by=v_actor
     WHERE request_id = p_request_id;

    -- Optional stock receive transaction
    IF p_receive_quantity IS NOT NULL AND p_receive_quantity > 0 THEN
        INSERT INTO inventorytransactions(inventory_id, transaction_type, quantity, date, remarks, performed_by, created_by)
        VALUES (v_req.inventory_id, 'RECEIVE', p_receive_quantity, now(), coalesce(p_note,'Approved request stock'), v_actor, v_actor);
    END IF;

    INSERT INTO activitylogs(action_type, actor_user_id, target_table, target_id, details)
    VALUES ('INVENTORY_REQUEST_APPROVED', v_actor, 'inventory_requests', p_request_id, jsonb_build_object('note', p_note, 'receive_quantity', p_receive_quantity));
END; $function$

| FUNCTION    | public         | authenticate_user                                | p_supabase_uuid uuid                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | TABLE(user_id bigint, role character varying, firstname character varying, surname character varying, email character varying)                                           | null                                                                                                                           | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.authenticate_user(p_supabase_uuid uuid)
 RETURNS TABLE(user_id bigint, role character varying, firstname character varying, surname character varying, email character varying)
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
    RETURN QUERY
    SELECT 
        u.user_id,
        u.role,
        u.firstname,
        u.surname,
        u.email
    FROM users u
    JOIN user_mapping um ON u.user_id = um.user_id
    WHERE um.uuid = p_supabase_uuid;
END;
$function$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| FUNCTION    | public         | cancel_receiving_report                          | p_report_id bigint, p_user_id bigint, p_reason text DEFAULT NULL::text                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | void                                                                                                                                                                     | null                                                                                                                           | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.cancel_receiving_report(p_report_id bigint, p_user_id bigint, p_reason text DEFAULT NULL::text)
 RETURNS void
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$DECLARE report_status VARCHAR; BEGIN
    SELECT status INTO report_status FROM receiving_reports WHERE report_id = p_report_id;
    IF report_status = 'COMPLETED' THEN
        RAISE EXCEPTION 'Cannot cancel a completed receiving report';
    END IF;
    UPDATE receiving_reports
    SET status = 'CANCELLED',
        supplier_notes = COALESCE(supplier_notes, '') || CASE WHEN p_reason IS NOT NULL THEN E'\nCancellation reason: ' || p_reason ELSE '' END, updated_at = NOW(), updated_by = p_user_id
    WHERE report_id = p_report_id;
END;$function$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| FUNCTION    | public         | check_and_expire_inventory                       |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | void                                                                                                                                                                     | null                                                                                                                           | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.check_and_expire_inventory()
 RETURNS void
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$DECLARE
    inv_record RECORD;
    current_balance INTEGER;
    expired_count INTEGER := 0;
    current_ph_time TIMESTAMP := (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Manila');
    current_ph_date DATE := (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Manila')::date;
BEGIN
    -- Find all inventory items that have expired and are not already marked as expired
    FOR inv_record IN
        SELECT i.inventory_id, i.vaccine_id, i.current_stock_level, i.expiration_date
        FROM inventory i
        WHERE i.is_deleted = FALSE
            AND i.expiration_date <= current_ph_date
            AND i.current_stock_level > 0
            AND NOT EXISTS (
                SELECT 1 FROM inventorytransactions it2
                WHERE it2.inventory_id = i.inventory_id
                    AND it2.transaction_type = 'EXPIRED'
            )
    LOOP
        current_balance := inv_record.current_stock_level;

        -- Create EXPIRED transaction for the entire remaining stock
        INSERT INTO inventorytransactions (
            inventory_id,
            transaction_type,
            quantity,
            balance_after,
            performed_by,
            created_by,
            remarks,
            date
        ) VALUES (
            inv_record.inventory_id,
            'EXPIRED',
            current_balance,  -- positive quantity; handled by trigger logic
            0,
            NULL,
            NULL,
            'Automatic expiry check - vaccine expired on ' || inv_record.expiration_date,
            CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
        );

        -- Update inventory stock level to 0
        UPDATE inventory
        SET current_stock_level = 0,
            updated_at = current_ph_time
        WHERE inventory_id = inv_record.inventory_id;

        -- Log the expiry activity
        INSERT INTO activitylogs (
            user_id,
            action_type,
            entity_type,
            entity_id,
            old_value,
            new_value,
            description,
            timestamp
        ) VALUES (
            NULL,
            'INVENTORY_STOCK_EXPIRED',
            'INVENTORY',
            inv_record.inventory_id,
            jsonb_build_object('current_stock_level', current_balance),
            jsonb_build_object('current_stock_level', 0),
            'Automatic expiry processing: ' || current_balance || ' units expired for vaccine expiring on ' || inv_record.expiration_date,
            CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
        );

        expired_count := expired_count + 1;
    END LOOP;

    -- Log the overall task completion if any items were expired
    IF expired_count > 0 THEN
        INSERT INTO activitylogs (
            user_id,
            action_type,
            entity_type,
            entity_id,
            description,
            timestamp
        ) VALUES (
            NULL,
            'TASK_SUCCESS',
            'SYSTEM',
            NULL,
            'Automatic inventory expiry check completed: ' || expired_count || ' inventory items expired',
            CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
        );
    END IF;
END;$function$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| FUNCTION    | public         | check_expired_inventory_scheduled                |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | void                                                                                                                                                                     | null                                                                                                                           | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.check_expired_inventory_scheduled()
 RETURNS void
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
  -- Call the canonical expiry check function if present; ignore if missing
  PERFORM 1 FROM pg_proc p JOIN pg_namespace n ON n.oid = p.pronamespace
   WHERE p.proname = 'check_and_expire_inventory' AND n.nspname = 'public';
  IF FOUND THEN
    PERFORM public.check_and_expire_inventory();
  END IF;
END;$function$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| FUNCTION    | public         | complete_receiving_report                        | p_report_id bigint, p_user_id bigint                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | void                                                                                                                                                                     | null                                                                                                                           | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.complete_receiving_report(p_report_id bigint, p_user_id bigint)
 RETURNS void
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$BEGIN
    PERFORM create_inventory_from_report(p_report_id, p_user_id);
    UPDATE receiving_reports SET status = 'COMPLETED', updated_at = NOW(), updated_by = p_user_id
    WHERE report_id = p_report_id;
END;$function$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| FUNCTION    | public         | compute_days_overdue                             | scheduled date, status schedule_status_enum, actual date                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | integer                                                                                                                                                                  | null                                                                                                                           | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.compute_days_overdue(scheduled date, status schedule_status_enum, actual date)
 RETURNS integer
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 IMMUTABLE STRICT
AS $function$
BEGIN
    IF status IN ('Pending','Scheduled','Due','Overdue') AND actual IS NULL AND scheduled < CURRENT_DATE THEN
        RETURN (CURRENT_DATE - scheduled);
    END IF;
    RETURN 0;
END; $function$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| FUNCTION    | public         | create_history_trigger                           | p_table text, p_pk text, p_history_table text                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | void                                                                                                                                                                     | null                                                                                                                           | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.create_history_trigger(p_table text, p_pk text, p_history_table text)
 RETURNS void
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
DECLARE
    v_func_name text := format('trg_%s_history_fn', p_table);
    v_trigger_name text := format('trg_%s_history', p_table);
    v_sql text;
BEGIN
    -- Create the per-table history function if missing
    IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM pg_proc WHERE proname = v_func_name) THEN
        v_sql := format($f$
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION %I() RETURNS trigger
LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $body$
DECLARE
    v_version int;
    v_id bigint;
BEGIN
    -- Determine primary key value depending on operation
    IF TG_OP = 'INSERT' OR TG_OP = 'UPDATE' THEN
        v_id := NEW.%I;
    ELSE
        v_id := OLD.%I; -- DELETE
    END IF;

    SELECT COALESCE(MAX(version_no),0)+1 INTO v_version FROM %I WHERE %I = v_id;

    INSERT INTO %I(%I, version_no, changed_by, changed_fields, snapshot)
    VALUES (
        v_id,
        v_version,
        NULLIF(current_setting('app.user_id', true),'')::bigint,
        CASE WHEN TG_OP = 'UPDATE' THEN jsonb_diff(to_jsonb(OLD), to_jsonb(NEW)) ELSE NULL END,
        to_jsonb(CASE WHEN TG_OP = 'DELETE' THEN OLD ELSE NEW END)
    );
    RETURN NULL; -- AFTER trigger ignores return tuple
END;
$body$;
        $f$, v_func_name, p_pk, p_pk, p_history_table, p_pk, p_history_table, p_pk);
        EXECUTE v_sql;
    END IF;

    -- Create the trigger if missing
    IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM pg_trigger WHERE tgname = v_trigger_name) THEN
        EXECUTE format('CREATE TRIGGER %I AFTER INSERT OR UPDATE OR DELETE ON %I FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION %I()', v_trigger_name, p_table, v_func_name);
    END IF;
END; $function$
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| FUNCTION    | public         | create_inventory_from_report                     | p_report_id bigint, p_user_id bigint                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | void                                                                                                                                                                     | null                                                                                                                           | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.create_inventory_from_report(p_report_id bigint, p_user_id bigint)
 RETURNS void
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$DECLARE item_record RECORD; new_inventory_id BIGINT; BEGIN
    FOR item_record IN
        SELECT * FROM receiving_report_items
        WHERE report_id = p_report_id AND inventory_created = FALSE AND is_deleted = FALSE
    LOOP
        -- Ensure vaccinemaster has the product; if vaccine_id is null, upsert using antigen+brand
        IF item_record.vaccine_id IS NULL THEN
            -- Try to find existing by antigen+brand(+manufacturer when provided)
            IF item_record.antigen_name IS NOT NULL AND item_record.brand_name IS NOT NULL THEN
                IF item_record.manufacturer IS NOT NULL THEN
                    SELECT vm.vaccine_id INTO item_record.vaccine_id
                    FROM vaccinemaster vm
                    WHERE lower(vm.antigen_name) = lower(item_record.antigen_name)
                      AND lower(vm.brand_name) = lower(item_record.brand_name)
                      AND lower(COALESCE(vm.manufacturer, '')) = lower(COALESCE(item_record.manufacturer, ''))
                    LIMIT 1;
                ELSE
                    SELECT vm.vaccine_id INTO item_record.vaccine_id
                    FROM vaccinemaster vm
                    WHERE lower(vm.antigen_name) = lower(item_record.antigen_name)
                      AND lower(vm.brand_name) = lower(item_record.brand_name)
                    LIMIT 1;
                END IF;

                -- If still null, insert a new vaccinemaster entry with upsert on unique constraint
                IF item_record.vaccine_id IS NULL THEN
                    BEGIN
                        INSERT INTO vaccinemaster (antigen_name, brand_name, manufacturer, vaccine_type, category, disease_prevented, created_by, updated_by)
                        VALUES (item_record.antigen_name, item_record.brand_name, item_record.manufacturer, 'inactivated', 'VACCINE', item_record.antigen_name, p_user_id, p_user_id)
                        RETURNING vaccine_id INTO item_record.vaccine_id;
                    EXCEPTION WHEN unique_violation THEN
                        -- Another session inserted concurrently; fetch the id
                        SELECT vm.vaccine_id INTO item_record.vaccine_id
                        FROM vaccinemaster vm
                        WHERE lower(vm.antigen_name) = lower(item_record.antigen_name)
                          AND lower(vm.brand_name) = lower(item_record.brand_name)
                          AND lower(COALESCE(vm.manufacturer, '')) = lower(COALESCE(item_record.manufacturer, ''))
                        LIMIT 1;
                    END;
                END IF;
            END IF;

            -- Persist resolved vaccine_id back to the item row
            IF item_record.vaccine_id IS NOT NULL THEN
              UPDATE receiving_report_items SET vaccine_id = item_record.vaccine_id WHERE item_id = item_record.item_id;
            END IF;
        END IF;

        -- Guard: vaccine_id must be resolved at this point
        IF item_record.vaccine_id IS NULL THEN
            RAISE EXCEPTION 'Receiving Report item % is missing vaccine identity (antigen/brand/manufacturer)', item_record.item_id;
        END IF;

        INSERT INTO inventory (
            vaccine_id, lot_number, expiration_date, current_stock_level, initial_quantity,
            received_date, storage_location, created_by, updated_by
        ) VALUES (
            item_record.vaccine_id,
            item_record.lot_number,
            item_record.expiration_date,
            0,
            item_record.quantity_received,
            (SELECT delivery_date FROM receiving_reports WHERE report_id = p_report_id),
            COALESCE(item_record.storage_location, ''),
            p_user_id, p_user_id
        ) RETURNING inventory_id INTO new_inventory_id;

        INSERT INTO inventorytransactions (
            inventory_id, transaction_type, quantity, performed_by, created_by, remarks, date, updated_by
        ) VALUES (
            new_inventory_id, 'RECEIVE', item_record.quantity_received, 
            p_user_id, p_user_id,
            'Received via Receiving Report #' || (SELECT report_number FROM receiving_reports WHERE report_id = p_report_id),
            CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, p_user_id
        );

        UPDATE receiving_report_items
        SET inventory_id = new_inventory_id, inventory_created = TRUE
        WHERE item_id = item_record.item_id;
    END LOOP;

    UPDATE receiving_reports
    SET total_items = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM receiving_report_items WHERE report_id = p_report_id AND is_deleted = FALSE),
        total_quantity = (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(quantity_received), 0) FROM receiving_report_items WHERE report_id = p_report_id AND is_deleted = FALSE)
    WHERE report_id = p_report_id;
END;$function$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| FUNCTION    | public         | create_patientschedule_on_patient_insert         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | trigger                                                                                                                                                                  | null                                                                                                                           | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.create_patientschedule_on_patient_insert()
 RETURNS trigger
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
    -- Delegate to canonical generator which uses schedule_master / schedule_doses
    PERFORM generate_patient_schedule(NEW.patient_id, NEW.created_by);
    RETURN NEW;
END;
$function$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| FUNCTION    | public         | create_user_with_mapping                         | p_supabase_uuid uuid, p_role character varying, p_surname character varying, p_firstname character varying, p_middlename character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, p_sex character varying DEFAULT 'Other'::character varying, p_birthdate date DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE, p_address text DEFAULT ''::text, p_contact_number character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, p_email character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, p_username character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, p_password_hash text DEFAULT ''::text                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | bigint                                                                                                                                                                   | null                                                                                                                           | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.create_user_with_mapping(p_supabase_uuid uuid, p_role character varying, p_surname character varying, p_firstname character varying, p_middlename character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, p_sex character varying DEFAULT 'Other'::character varying, p_birthdate date DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE, p_address text DEFAULT ''::text, p_contact_number character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, p_email character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, p_username character varying DEFAULT NULL::character varying, p_password_hash text DEFAULT ''::text)
 RETURNS bigint
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
DECLARE
    new_user_id BIGINT;
BEGIN
    -- Insert user
    INSERT INTO users (role, surname, firstname, middlename, sex, birthdate, address, contact_number, email, username, password_hash)
    VALUES (p_role, p_surname, p_firstname, p_middlename, p_sex, p_birthdate, p_address, p_contact_number, p_email, p_username, p_password_hash)
    RETURNING user_id INTO new_user_id;
    
    -- Create mapping with actual Supabase UUID
    INSERT INTO user_mapping (uuid, user_id)
    VALUES (p_supabase_uuid, new_user_id)
    ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE SET uuid = p_supabase_uuid;
    
    RETURN new_user_id;
END;
$function$

                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| FUNCTION    | public         | current_app_role                                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | text                                                                                                                                                                     | null                                                                                                                           | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.current_app_role()
 RETURNS text
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 SECURITY DEFINER
 SET search_path TO 'public'
AS $function$
DECLARE v_role text;
BEGIN
  v_role := NULLIF(current_setting('app.role', true),'');
  IF v_role IS NOT NULL THEN RETURN v_role; END IF;
  RETURN COALESCE(
    nullif(current_setting('request.jwt.claim.role', true), ''),
    (nullif(current_setting('request.jwt.claims', true), '')::jsonb ->> 'role')
  );
END$function$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| FUNCTION    | public         | current_app_user_id                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | bigint                                                                                                                                                                   | null                                                                                                                           | CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.current_app_user_id()
 RETURNS bigint
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 SECURITY DEFINER
 SET search_path TO 'public'
AS $function$
DECLARE
  v_uid text;
  v_id bigint;
BEGIN
  -- Prefer explicit app context if set by API
  v_id := NULLIF(current_setting('app.user_id', true),'')::bigint;
  IF v_id IS NOT NULL THEN RETURN v_id; END IF;

  -- Fallback to Supabase JWT 'sub' mapped via users table
  v_uid := COALESCE(
    nullif(current_setting('request.jwt.claim.sub', true), ''),
    (nullif(current_setting('request.jwt.claims', true), '')::jsonb ->> 'sub')
  );
  IF v_uid IS NOT NULL THEN
    -- Map JWT subject to our internal user_id via user_mapping
    SELECT um.user_id INTO v_id
    FROM public.user_mapping um
    WHERE um.uuid = v_uid::uuid
    LIMIT 1;
  END IF;
  RETURN v_id;
END$function$
